_instructions: Copy this entire document into ChatGPT, Claude, or any AI tool. Then describe the article you want to create. The AI will produce valid JSON that can be uploaded directly to the Splits Network CMS via POST /api/v2/pages/import.

output_format.slug: string — URL path (lowercase, hyphens, slashes allowed). Example: 'about', 'resources/career-guides'
output_format.title: string — Page title (used in <title> tag and OG)
output_format.og_image: string (optional) — URL to Open Graph image
output_format.author: string (optional) — Author name
output_format.blocks: ContentBlock[] — ordered array of blocks (see schema below)

hero.description: Full-width hero section. Split-screen layout with text on left, image on right. Should be the FIRST block on every page.

fields.kicker: string (optional) — Small label above headline, e.g. 'ABOUT US', 'INDUSTRY INSIGHTS'
fields.kickerIcon: string (optional) — FontAwesome class, e.g. 'fa-duotone fa-regular fa-building'
fields.headlineWords: array of { text: string, accent?: boolean } — Each word in the headline. Set accent: true for 1-2 words to highlight in theme accent color.
fields.subtitle: string (optional) — Paragraph below headline
fields.imageAlt: string (optional) — Alt text for hero image
fields.meta: array of { icon?: string, label: string } (optional) — Info pills below subtitle (date, read time, category)

items.question: How does the split-fee model work?
items.answer: When a recruiter places a candidate in a company's role, the placement fee is split between the company and recruiter according to pre-agreed terms. All fees are tracked transparently on the platform.

items.question: Is there a cost to join?
items.answer: Recruiters can join for free with our Starter plan. Companies pay a subscription that includes access to the recruiter marketplace, ATS, and analytics.

items.question: How long does onboarding take?

composition_rules: 3. Alternate bg colors between adjacent blocks for visual rhythm: base-100, base-200, base-100, base-200...
4. Use 'pull-quote' blocks to break up long text sections (every 2-3 article-body blocks).
5. Use 'stats-bar' with bg 'neutral' for high-impact data sections.
6. Use 'split-editorial' to alternate image sides: text-left, then text-right, then text-left.
7. Use 'full-bleed-image' or 'inline-image' as visual breathers between dense text.
8. Use numbered sectionNumbers ('01', '02', '03') for article-body and split-editorial blocks to create a structured reading flow.
9. Keep paragraphs concise — 2-4 sentences each. Long blocks of text hurt readability.
10. For icons, use FontAwesome duotone format: 'fa-duotone fa-regular fa-{icon-name}'.

items.question: Is it free to join as a recruiter?
items.answer: Yes! Our Starter plan is completely free. You can browse roles, submit candidates, and earn placement fees at no cost. Premium plans offer additional features like AI matching and priority support.

items.question: How are fees split?
items.answer: Fee splits are set by the hiring company when they post a role. Typical splits range from 50/50 to 70/30 in favor of the placing recruiter. All terms are visible before you engage.

items.question: Can I use Splits Network alongside my existing business?
items.answer: Absolutely. Most recruiters use Splits Network as an additional channel alongside their existing client relationships. It's incremental revenue, not a replacement.

import_instructions.authentication: Required — Bearer token with platform admin role
import_instructions.body: The full page JSON object (same structure as full_page_example above)

query_params.upsert: Set to 'true' to update an existing page with the same slug+app combination instead of failing

notes: Pages are created with status 'draft' by default. Use PATCH /api/v2/pages/:id to publish.
The slug must be unique per app. Use ?upsert=true to overwrite existing content.
All block types in the blocks array are validated — invalid types will be rejected.
Images should be uploaded to Supabase Storage first, then referenced by URL.
